data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 2, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Wolverhampton are coming forward and Raul Jimenez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In London, Matt Doherty of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 7, Stuart Attwell awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 10, Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Chelsea.
In the minute 12, Reece James (Chelsea) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Raul Jimenez (Wolverhampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 16, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Chelsea throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 22, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Diogo Jota (Wolverhampton) has received a yellow card from Stuart Attwell.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 27, Stuart Attwell blows against Chelsea's Olivier Giroud for offside.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, The match at Stamford Bridge has been interrupted briefly for a check on Raul Jimenez, who is down injured.
Olivier Giroud for Chelsea is whistled offside.
Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 35, Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Stamford Bridge.
Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Chelsea have a dangerous throw-in.
In London, Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 41, Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Free kick Chelsea.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in London.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, At Stamford Bridge, Pedro Neto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Chelsea take a 1-0 lead thanks to Mason Mount.
Olivier Giroud is booked for the home team.
Olivier Giroud puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Mason Mount with an assist there.
The second-half is underway at Stamford Bridge.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 46, Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a first substitution, with Adama Traore replacing Pedro Neto.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 54, Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Wolverhampton drives forward and Diogo Jota gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 59, Mason Mount for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ruben Vinagre is on a sub for Jonny Castro for Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton make their third substitution with Daniel Podence replacing Matt Doherty.
In the minute 59, Joao Moutinho is replacing Ruben Neves for Wolverhampton at Stamford Bridge.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 61, Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, Stuart Attwell signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 65, Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Diogo Jota for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Stamford Bridge. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea just outside Wolverhampton's area.
Stuart Attwell awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
In London Chelsea attack through Christian Pulisic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Chelsea.
The home team replace Olivier Giroud with Tammy Abraham.
Callum Hudson-Odoi is replacing Christian Pulisic for the home team.
Chelsea's Mason Mount breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 79, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Free kick Chelsea.
In the minute 83, Leander Dendoncker for Wolverhampton has been booked by Stuart Attwell and receives a first yellow card.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Jordao is replacing Diogo Jota for the away team.
In the minute 85, Frank Lampard is making the team's fourth substitution at Stamford Bridge with Pedro replacing Mason Mount.
Chelsea make their third substitution with Ruben Loftus-Cheek replacing Mateo Kovacic.
Stuart Attwell awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Wolverhampton.
The home team have replaced Jorginho with Ross Barkley. This is the fifth substitution made today by Frank Lampard.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
At Stamford Bridge the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Chelsea pushes forward through Tammy Abraham, whose finish on goal is saved.
In London Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence is caught offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Chelsea's Cesar Azpilicueta has been booked in London.
